planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun and the smallest in the solar system.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Venus is shrouded in thick clouds and is the hottest planet due to a runaway greenhouse effect.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: Earth is the only known planet to support life, with abundant water and a breathable atmosphere.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: Mars is known as the Red Planet and has the tallest volcano in the solar system.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system with dozens of moons and a giant storm.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Saturn is famous for its bright ring system and is the second largest planet.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: Uranus is an ice giant with a unique sideways rotation and faint rings.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: Neptune is a deep blue ice giant with the strongest winds in the solar system.
